Package commInfra

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • commInfra.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Internal structure of a message exchanged between the client and the server. It is used to implement the client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
